name: Auterion AG
membership:
Dronecode member (www.dronecode.org)
Drone Industry Association Switzerland (http://droneindustry.ch/)
goal: Auterion is the largest open source drone software company. We provide a turnkey drone operating system worldwide to drone manufacturers and drone service providers. The system includes the autopilot software on the drone (based on the open source PX4 project), obstacle avoidance, communication, ground control station, and data logging for product improvement and compliance. Our services include SORA certification to allow drone manufacturers to bring advanced products to market and drone service providers to operate in special condition (e.g. BVLOS). Auterion is headquartered in Zurich and is backed by top European and US investors.
interests: Business and Industry, Digital economy and society
euInitiatives: All initiatives around the safe integrations of drones into the manned airspance (e.g. JARUS, U-Space)
